title: Seattle City Council Transportation and Seattle Public Utilities 8/2/22

Agenda: Call to Order; Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; CB 120373:Ordinace relating to Seattle Public Utilities and easements granted to City of Seattle; CB 120364: Ordinance relating to Traffic Code and parking for truck tractors in the public right of way; Appointments and reappointments to Seattle Pedestrian Advisory Board, Seattle School Traffic
